description: Concatenation of prime factors of a(n) is a prime.
comments: For the corresponding primes, see A038514. - _Lekraj Beedassy_, Jun 05 2009
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
example: 162 = 2 * 3 * 3 * 3 * 3 and 23333 is a prime, so 162 is in the sequence.
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Jun 15 1998.
extensions: Edited by _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 23 2010
